Bethlehem.East Branch Saucon Creek: East Branch Saucon Creek (also known as Laubachs Creek) is a tributary of Saucon Creek in Northampton County, Pennsylvania, in the United States. It is approximately 5.9 miles (9.5 km) long and flows through Lower Saucon Township and Bethlehem. The watershed of the creek has an area of 10.3 square miles (27 km2).
